name: Green Mesa
body:
## HalogenJS

[HalogenJS](https://halogenjs.org) is a HAL/HAL-O JSON framework for working natively with hypermedia resources in the browser. 

## Animation and Experimental Modules

Many additional modules are available on Charlotte Gore's personal Github [here](http://github.com/charlottegore), which tend to be available on npm with the ```gm-``` prefix. 

The modules are CommonJS with fluent interfaces, and many are intended for use for animation, games and web audio.

## Dom / Value / Traverse / CSS

Green Mesa maintain forks of [component-dom](https://github.com/component/dom) and some of its dependencies which fixes issues around dealing with forms. This is a dependency for [HalogenJS](https://halogenjs.org) as we do not want to have jQuery as a dependency. 

## Route

Green Mesa maintain a fork of [component-route](https://github.com/component/route) in order to have it available as an npm package.

## Hyperbone

Hyperbone is the a collection of components for a hypermedia framework that has since become [HalogenJS](https://halogenjs.org). These repositories are maintained so that they will continue to be available through Component, and they're also maintained as NPM packages.

## Backbone 

Backbone refactored into individual components. A dependency for HalogenJS (and Hyperbone).

We have:

- [Backbone Events](https://github.com/green-mesa/backbone-events)
- [Backbone Model](https://github.com/green-mesa/backbone-model)
- [Backbone Collection](https://github.com/green-mesa/backbone-collection)
